title: Brothers Conflict
synopsis: Ema Hinata is a sweet girl with only her father to call family. One day, she learns that he will be remarrying Miwa Asahina, a wealthy fashion designer. Though she's glad she has a new place to call home, the family she gains is greater than she could ever imagineâ€”Ema now has 13 step-brothers!
